description: Only selected algorithms are allowed to run on this data set. Updating these settings will create an on-chain transaction you have to approve in your wallet.

data.name: publisherTrustedAlgorithms
data.label: Selected Algorithms
data.help: Choose one or multiple algorithms you trust to allow them to run on this data set.

data.name: allowAllPublishedAlgorithms
data.label: All Algorithms
data.help: Allow any published algorithm to run on this data set.
